edu.hist.team3.catering.database

Class DatabaseManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.hist.team3.catering.database.DatabaseManager

  • public class DatabaseManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Used to manage the database.

      • DatabaseManager

        public DatabaseManager(java.lang.String url,
               java.lang.String username,
               java.lang.String password)
                throws java.sql.SQLException
        Constructs a DatabaseManager with a new SQL connection.
        Parameters:
        url - The URL we want to connect to
        username - The username required for the connection
        password - The password required for the connection
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - If it failed to connect to the database

                throws java.sql.SQLException
        Constructs a DatabaseManager with an old SQL connection.
        Parameters:
        connection - The connection to be used
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - If it failed to connect to the database
